description: This file is a build component file (likely a BitBake recipe or include file) that manages packaging and splitting of GStreamer plugins into individual packages for an OpenEmbedded/BitBake build system. It includes Python functions to dynamically generate package names and dependencies based on available plugins and shared libraries.

methods.name: split_gstreamer10_packages
methods.description: Dynamically splits GStreamer plugin libraries, typelib files, and static libraries into separate packages with appropriate descriptions and dependencies.

methods.name: set_gstreamer10_metapkg_rdepends
methods.description: Sets runtime dependencies for the main meta package by aggregating dependencies from all generated plugin packages, excluding certain primary packages and empty ones.
